content: The first national marine monument in the Atlantic, The Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument, was designated by President Obama in 2016. It lies approximately 300 miles due east of Philadelphia and is a biodiversity hot spot, protected in 2021 by a Supreme Court refusal to hear a case rejecting an effort by the commercial fishing industry to strip protections of this extraordinary undersea landscape__no.0738, 2021. #AtlanticOcean #MarineNationalMonument #biodiversityhotspot
